I've successfully explored the directory structure and here's what I found: ## Directory Overview The working directory contains what appears to be extracted files from a Chinese browser extension called "火山方舟大模型体验中心-火山引擎" (Volcano Engine's Large Model Experience Center). ## Key Files Identified: - **c:\Users\1\Desktop\火山方舟大模型体验中心-火山引擎_files\manifest.json** - Extension manifest - **c:\Users\1\Desktop\火山方舟大模型体验中心-火山引擎_files\background.js** - Background service worker - **c:\Users\1\Desktop\火山方舟大模型体验中心-火山引擎_files\content.js** - Content script - **c:\Users\1\Desktop\火山方舟大模型体验中心-火山引擎_files\popup.js** - Popup interface script - **c:\Users\1\Desktop\火山方舟大模型体验中心-火山引擎_files\popup.html** - Popup interface - **c:\Users\1\Desktop\火山方舟大模型体验中心-火山引擎_files\options.js** - Options page script - **c:\Users\1\Desktop\火山方舟大模型体验中心-火山引擎_files\options.html** - Options page - **c:\Users\1\Desktop\火山方舟大模型体验中心-火山引擎_files\vendor.js** - Third-party libraries - **c:\Users\1\Desktop\火山方舟大模型体验中心-火山引擎_files\content.css** - Content script styles - **c:\Users\1\Desktop\火山方舟大模型体验中心-火山引擎_files\popup.css** - Popup styles - **c:\Users\1\Desktop\火山方舟大模型体验中心-火山引擎_files\favicon.png** - Extension icon ## Extension Details: - **Name**: 火山方舟大模型体验中心-火山引擎 (Volcano Ark Large Model Experience Center - Volcano Engine) - **Version**: 2.1.2 - **Manifest Version**: 3 - **API Endpoint**: https://ark.cn-beijing.volces.com/api/v1 - **Default Model**: ep-20241209123456-abcde The extension appears to be related to Volcano Engine's (ByteDance's cloud service) large language model platform, allowing users to experience and interact with various AI models.
